issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site
issue.description: A region containing Mesp2 (Chr25:11,382,068-11,383,326) and surrounding genes (e.g. sv2b, anpep) seems to be artificially duplicated in Zv9
issue.resolution_text: The TPF has been amended to resolve the artificial of genes. BX572619.12 and CR339041.7 have had their finish regions adapted to facilitate a good alignment between them, and have now been updated to BX572619.13 and CR339041.8

issue.summary: No overlap detected between BX323801.8 and AL928858.10, creating a problem in the tile path
issue.description: There is no overlap detected between the components BX323801.8 and AL928858.10. This may be due to variation or may need a gap inserting, either way this region needs to be investigated.
issue.resolution_text: AL928858.10 has been removed from the TPF, leaving a join between BX323801.8 and AL928892.7

issue.summary: No overlap detected between CU372913.4 and CR381664.8, creating a problem in the tile path
issue.description: There is no overlap detected between the components CU372913.4 and CR381664.8. This may be due to variation or may need a gap inserting, either way this region needs to be investigated.
issue.resolution_text: CU372913.4 has been removed from the TPF, leaving an overlap between CR936457.12 and CR381664.9

issue.summary: No overlap detected between CR376821.11 and CU181885.7, creating a problem in the tile path
issue.description: There is no overlap detected between the components CR376821.11 and CU181885.7. This may be due to variation or may need a gap inserting, either way this region needs to be investigated.
issue.resolution_text: CU181885.7 has been removed from the TPF leaving an overlap between CR376821.12 and CR450817.7

issue.summary: possible artificial duplication (CU459177.7 and CU184832.20)
issue.description: CU459177.7 and CU184832.20 have significant overlap and the placement seems to have lead to the duplication in Ensembl of PTHLH and possibly of gtf2h1 and rccd1.
issue.resolution_text: I have removed CU459177.7 from the TPF. This component was redundant under CU184832.20. This should facilitate the join between CU184832.20 and CU207255.9. It should also solve the duplication of PTHLH, which is now just present on CU184832.20.

issue.summary: Assembly gap between BX957333.8 and CR391977.5.
issue.status_text: CU280673.12 unplaced contig in the current zebrafish genome assembly Zv9. This contig was placed between the two accessions of this ticket based on marker information. Its location may yet be improved.
issue.description: Assembly gap between CU929419.6 (CH211-10M5) and CR391977.5 (DKEYP-73B11).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Contig order problem
issue.description: End sequence alignments indicate an incorrect contig order in the TPF between FP245455.5 and FP102921.4
issue.resolution_text: Component FP102921.4 has been moved to link it to FP245455.5. The tickets in this region have been updated to account for this change.

issue.description: Assembly gap between CU137647.9 (DKEY-201C1) and FP102921.4 (CH73-365I12).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site
issue.status_text: Reviewing region where cmasb is found, currently covered by Whole Genome Shotgun data. GRCZ10_WGSCTG1115 looks to be in the wrong orientation
issue.description: GRCz10 The cmasb gene (mRNA accession no. NM_001258409.1) is split into 2 parts on opposing strands on chromosome 25. Exons 1-3 are placed at complement(5037674..5039775), exons 5-8 are located on 5127975..5134788. Part of the cmasb mRNA (nucleotides 488-622, "exon 4") is missing completely in the genome assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na
